data.title: Adjustment and Change on Securities Options (Effective from September 28, 2023)
data.meta_description: Japan Exchange Group (JPX) offers a one-stop shop for a range of products and services with TSE, OSE, and TOCOM markets at its core, ensuring safe and highly convenient trading venues for all market users.
data.text:
Stock splits are scheduled for the underlying securities, as listed below. (effective from October 1, 2023)

In accordance with this, OSE shall adjust the strike prices of option contracts which are based upon these underlying securities on September 28, 2023, the date on which trading starts for shares after the stock splits.
